# Raft Leader 选举测试

# 基本选举测试
leader_election \
nodes=(1,2,3,4,5) \
term=1 \
votes=(1,2,3)
----
leader=1
term=1
votes=3

# 网络分区后的选举
network_partition \
partition1=(1,2,3) \
partition2=(4,5) \
current_term=5
----
partition1_leader=1
partition2_leader=4
term_conflict=true

# 高任期领导者选举
higher_term_election \
current_leader=2 \
current_term=3 \
new_term=5 \
votes=(1,3,4,5)
----
new_leader=1
term=5
old_leader_step_down=true

# 脑裂场景
split_brain \
majority1=(1,2,3) \
majority2=(4,5,6) \
term=7
----
split_detected=true
no_majority=false
requires_intervention=true
